main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects were reported by USAF pilots near Misawa Air Base, Japan, on April 27 and May 5, 1950.
interesting points: The unidentified objects were described as moving at incredible speeds, up to 600 mph, and displayed no visible means of propulsion., Multiple pilots reported seeing the objects at altitudes of 25,000 to 30,000 feet., One pilot observed the object for about 10-15 minutes before it disappeared from sight., The sightings were believed to be visual effects caused by shock waves from USAF aircraft, rather than solid objects., The cases were classified under Project Blue Book and were eventually declassified in December 2008.
